title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 303.7 - Persons with AIDS or infected with HIV
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 303.7 - Persons with AIDS or infected with HIV
State Regulations

For purposes of this Part, the term handicap includes
being diagnosed as having AIDS, testing positive for HIV infection, or being
perceived as susceptible to AIDS or HIV infection. Such persons must be
protected from discrimination in accordance with all applicable provisions of
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
303.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
